title: On the ground in Ukraine using Starlink to stay connected
summary: Starlink is helping many people in Ukraine, including a friend of mine who is on the ground helping to train the military. Gia...

title: NASA Invites Media to Learn About Inflatable Heat Shield Demo
summary: NASA and United Launch Alliance (ULA) will host a media briefing on Tuesday, Oct. 11, at 1 p.m. EDT in advance of the Low-Earth Orbit Flight Test of an Inflatable Decelerator (LOFTID) technology demonstration. The briefing will be held via WebEx.

title: Crew Dragon launches safely, carrying first Russian from US soil in 20 years
summary: "Whooo, that was a smooth ride uphill!"

title: NASA’s SpaceX Crew-5 Launches to International Space Station
summary: The crew members assigned to NASA’s SpaceX Crew-5 mission are in orbit following their launch to the International Space Station noon EDT Wednesday, from Launch Complex 39A at NASA’s Kennedy Space Center in Florida.

title: SpaceX launches Crew-5 mission to the space station
summary: A SpaceX Crew Dragon spacecraft with four people on board is on its way to the International Space Station after a successful launch Oct. 5.
